member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA
member.summary: Contains protected members of the base class. BASEBROWSERDATA defines the browser state and is used with and .

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._hwnd
member.summary: The handle of the browser's top-level window.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._ptl
member.summary: A pointer to the browser's .

summary.para: A pointer to the browser's IHlinkFrame.
summary.div: Note This member is only valid on first navigation from an hlink element-compatible application such as Word.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pautoWB2
member.summary: A pointer to the browser's object.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pautoEDS
member.summary: A pointer to the browser's object.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pautoSS
member.summary: A pointer to the browser's object.

summary.para: One of the following values to indicate the security lock icon.
No change in security encryption status.
Default. 0x0000. No security encryption present.
There are multiple security encryption methods present.
The security encryption level is not known.
There is 40-bit security encryption present.
There is 56-bit security encryption present.
There is Fortezza security encryption present.
There is 128-bit security encryption present.
A security encryption setting should be suggested.
No security encryption has been suggested.
Mixed security encryption methods have been suggested.
Unknown security encryption method has been suggested.
40-bit security encryption has been suggested.
56-bit security encryption has been suggested.
Fortezza security encryption has been suggested.
128-bit security encryption has been suggested.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._fCreatingViewWindow
member.summary: A view window is being created by the browser.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._uActivateState
member.summary: The browser view is in an activated state.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pctView
member.summary: A cached pointer to the object associated with the object pointed to by _psv.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pidlCur
member.summary: A PIDL of the current navigated location of the browser. This value is the same retrieved by .

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._psv
member.summary: A pointer to the of the current location. This IShellView is bound to _pidlCur through .

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._psf
member.summary: A pointer to the of the current location. This IShellFolder is bound to _pidlCur.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._hwndView
member.summary: A handle to the window returned by .

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pszTitleCur
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer containing the Unicode title text for the current location.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pidlPending
member.summary: The PIDL of the pending target location. Once navigation is complete, this value moves to _pidlCur.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._psvPending
member.summary: The of the pending target location. Once navigation is complete, this value moves to _psv.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._psfPending
member.summary: The of the pending target location. Once navigation is complete, this value moves to _psf.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._hwndViewPending
member.summary: A handle to the pending target location's view window. Once navigation is complete, this value moves to _hwndView.

member.name: BASEBROWSERDATA._pszTitlePending
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer containing the Unicode title text for the pending target location. Once navigation is complete, this value moves to _pszTitleCur.

summary.para: A value of type BOOL that indicates whether the browser is hosting folder content or web content.
The browser is hosting web content.
The browser is hosting folder content.
A value of type BOOL that indicates whether there is a privacy concern with the browser's content.
There is a privacy concern with the browser's content.
There is not a privacy concern with the browser's content.
Windows Vista with Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later or Windows Internet Explorer 7 and later only. 0 if the phishing filter is off; 1 if it is on.
A temporary placeholder for _pidlPending on first navigation to the pending location.
